name: Island of the Carribean
description:
Hi all,

This is a shop-simulator game, inspired by Recettear (at least that's what I hope to achieve with 3 days :) ).

I hope you enjoy the game and follow me @Thomas_Yang1 as I'm looking for people to make games together!

Credits:
